patched_yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-latest
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-latest
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    securityContext:
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-latest
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    securityContext:
      runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-latest
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-latest
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-latest
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-latest
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    securityContext:
      runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: privileged-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: ubuntu
    image: ubuntu:22.04
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
    command:
    - sleep
    - '3600'

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: privileged-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: ubuntu
    image: ubuntu:22.04
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
    command:
    - sleep
    - '3600'

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: security-risk
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: web
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      hostPort: 30080
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        - SYS_ADMIN
  volumes:
  - name: host-data
    emptyDir: {}

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: security-risk
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: web
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        - SYS_ADMIN
  volumes:
  - name: host-data
    hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/data

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: security-risk
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: web
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      hostPort: 30080
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        - SYS_ADMIN
      runAsUser: 1000
  volumes:
  - name: host-data
    hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/data

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: security-risk
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: web
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      hostPort: 30080
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        - SYS_ADMIN
      seccompProfile:
        type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - name: host-data
    hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/data

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: security-risk
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: web
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      hostPort: 30080
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add: []
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
  volumes:
  - name: host-data
    hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/data
